verses.verse: On that day <S%H3117><s%> they read <S%H7121><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the audience <S%H241><s%> of the people; <S%H5971><s%> and therein was found <S%H4672><s%> written, <S%H3789><s%> that an Ammonite <S%H5984><s%> and a Moabite <S%H4125><s%> should not enter <S%H935><s%> into the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> <S%H99999><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%>

because they didn't <S%H6923><s%> meet the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> with bread <S%H3899><s%> and with water, <S%H4325><s%> but hired <S%H7936><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%> against them, <S%H7043><s%> to curse them: <S%H430><s%> however our God turned <S%H2015><s%> the curse <S%H7043><s%> into a blessing. <S%H1293><s%>
It came to pass, <S%H8085><s%> when they had heard the law, <S%H8451><s%> that they separated <S%H914><s%> from Israel <S%H3478><s%> all the mixed multitude. <S%H6154><s%>

Now before <S%H6440><s%> this, <S%H475><s%> Eliashib the priest, <S%H3548><s%> who was appointed <S%H5414><s%> over the rooms <S%H3957><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God, <S%H430><s%> being allied <S%H7138><s%> to Tobiah, <S%H2900><s%>

had prepared <S%H6213><s%> for him a great <S%H1419><s%> room, <S%H3957><s%> where before <S%H6440><s%> they laid <S%H5414><s%> the meal offerings, <S%H4503><s%> the frankincense, <S%H3828><s%> and the vessels, <S%H3627><s%> and the tithes <S%H4643><s%> of the grain, <S%H1715><s%> the new wine, <S%H8492><s%> and the oil, <S%H3323><s%> which were given by commandment <S%H4687><s%> to the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> and the singers, <S%H7891><s%> and the porters; <S%H7778><s%> and the wave offerings <S%H8641><s%> for the priests. <S%H3548><s%>

But in all this, <S%H3389><s%> I was not at Jerusalem; for in the two <S%H8147><s%> and thirtieth <S%H7970><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Artaxerxes <S%H783><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> I went <S%H935><s%> to the king: <S%H4428><s%> and after <S%H7093><s%> certain days <S%H3117><s%> asked I leave <S%H7592><s%> of the king, <S%H4428><s%>

and I came <S%H935><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and understood <S%H995><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> that Eliashib <S%H475><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> for Tobiah, <S%H2900><s%> in preparing <S%H6213><s%> him a room <S%H5393><s%> in the courts <S%H2691><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>

It grieved <S%H3415><s%> me severely: <S%H3966><s%> therefore I cast forth <S%H7993><s%> all the household <S%H1004><s%> stuff <S%H3627><s%> of Tobiah <S%H2900><s%> out of <S%H2351><s%> the room. <S%H3957><s%>

Then I commanded, <S%H559><s%> and they cleansed <S%H2891><s%> the rooms: <S%H3957><s%> and there brought I again <S%H7725><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> with the meal offerings <S%H4503><s%> and the frankincense. <S%H3828><s%>

I perceived <S%H3045><s%> that the portions <S%H4521><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> had not been given <S%H5414><s%> them; <S%H3881><s%> so that the Levites and the singers, <S%H7891><s%> who did <S%H6213><s%> the work, <S%H4399><s%> had fled <S%H1272><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> to his field. <S%H7704><s%>

Then I contended <S%H7378><s%> with the rulers, <S%H5461><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Why is the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> forsaken? <S%H5800><s%>" I gathered them together, <S%H6908><s%> and set <S%H5975><s%> them in their place. <S%H5977><s%>
Then brought <S%H935><s%> all Judah <S%H3063><s%> the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of the grain <S%H1715><s%> and the new wine <S%H8492><s%> and the oil <S%H3323><s%> to the treasuries. <S%H214><s%>

I made treasurers <S%H686><s%> over the treasuries, <S%H214><s%> Shelemiah <S%H8018><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and Zadok <S%H6659><s%> the scribe, <S%H5608><s%> and of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> Pedaiah: <S%H6305><s%> and next to them <S%H3027><s%> was Hanan <S%H2605><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zaccur, <S%H2139><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mattaniah; <S%H4983><s%> for they were counted <S%H2803><s%> faithful, <S%H539><s%> and their business was to distribute <S%H2505><s%> to their brothers. <S%H251><s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> me, <S%H430><s%> my God, concerning this, <S%H4229><s%> and don't wipe out my good <S%H2617><s%> deeds that I have done <S%H6213><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of my God, <S%H430><s%> and for its observances. <S%H4929><s%>

In those days <S%H3117><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> I in Judah <S%H3063><s%> some men treading <S%H1869><s%> winepresses <S%H1660><s%> on the Sabbath, <S%H7676><s%> and bringing in <S%H935><s%> sheaves, <S%H6194><s%> and loading <S%H6006><s%> donkeys; <S%H2543><s%> as also wine, <S%H3196><s%> grapes, <S%H6025><s%> and figs, <S%H8384><s%> and all kinds of burdens, <S%H4853><s%> which they brought <S%H935><s%> into Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> on the Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> and I testified <S%H5749><s%> against them in the day <S%H3117><s%> in which they sold <S%H4376><s%> food. <S%H6718><s%>

There lived <S%H3427><s%> men of Tyre <S%H6876><s%> also therein, <S%H935><s%> who brought in fish, <S%H1709><s%> and all kinds of wares, <S%H4377><s%> and sold <S%H4376><s%> on the Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

Then I contended <S%H7378><s%> with the nobles <S%H2715><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H7451><s%> "What evil thing <S%H1697><s%> is this that you do, <S%H6213><s%> and profane <S%H2490><s%> the Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day? <S%H3117><s%>

Didn't <S%H6213><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%> do thus, <S%H6213><s%> and didn't our God <S%H430><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> all this evil <S%H7451><s%> on us, <S%H5892><s%> and on this city? Yet you bring <S%H935><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> wrath <S%H2740><s%> on Israel <S%H3478><s%> by profaning <S%H2490><s%> the Sabbath. <S%H7676><s%>"

It came to pass that, <S%H8179><s%> when the gates of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> began to be dark <S%H6751><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Sabbath, <S%H7676><s%> I commanded <S%H559><s%> that the doors <S%H1817><s%> should be shut, <S%H5462><s%> and commanded <S%H559><s%> that they should not be opened <S%H6605><s%> until after <S%H310><s%> the Sabbath. <S%H7676><s%> I set <S%H5975><s%> some of my servants <S%H5288><s%> over the gates, <S%H8179><s%> that no burden <S%H4853><s%> should be brought in <S%H935><s%> on the Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

So the merchants <S%H7402><s%> and sellers <S%H4376><s%> of all kinds of wares <S%H4465><s%> lodged <S%H3885><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> once <S%H6471><s%> or twice. <S%H8147><s%>

Then I testified <S%H5749><s%> against them, <S%H559><s%> and said to them, <S%H3885><s%> "Why do you stay around <S%H5048><s%> the wall? <S%H2346><s%> If you do so again, <S%H8138><s%> I will lay <S%H7971><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> on you. <S%H6256><s%>" From that time on, <S%H935><s%> they didn't come on the Sabbath. <S%H7676><s%>

I commanded <S%H559><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> that they should purify <S%H2891><s%> themselves, <S%H935><s%> and that they should come and keep <S%H8104><s%> the gates, <S%H8179><s%> to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%> Remember <S%H2142><s%> to me, <S%H430><s%> my God, this also, <S%H2347><s%> and spare me according to the greatness <S%H7230><s%> of your loving kindness. <S%H2617><s%>
In those days <S%H3117><s%> also saw <S%H7200><s%> I the Jews <S%H3064><s%> who had married <S%H3427><s%> women <S%H802><s%> of Ashdod, <S%H796><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5984><s%> and of Moab: <S%H4125><s%>

I contended <S%H7378><s%> with them, <S%H7043><s%> and cursed them, <S%H5221><s%> and struck certain <S%H582><s%> of them, <S%H4803><s%> and plucked off their hair, and made them swear <S%H7650><s%> by God, <S%H430><s%> "You shall not give <S%H5414><s%> your daughters <S%H1323><s%> to their sons, <S%H1121><s%> nor take <S%H5375><s%> their daughters <S%H1323><s%> for your sons, <S%H1121><s%> or for yourselves.

Didn't <S%H8010><s%> Solomon king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> sin <S%H2398><s%> by these things? <S%H7227><s%> Yet among many nations <S%H1471><s%> was there no king <S%H4428><s%> like him, <S%H157><s%> and he was beloved of his God, <S%H430><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H5414><s%> him king <S%H4428><s%> over all Israel. <S%H3478><s%> Nevertheless foreign <S%H5237><s%> women <S%H802><s%> caused even him <S%H1571><s%> to sin. <S%H2398><s%>

Shall we then listen <S%H8085><s%> to you to do <S%H6213><s%> all this great <S%H1419><s%> evil, <S%H7451><s%> to trespass <S%H4603><s%> against our God <S%H430><s%> in marrying <S%H3427><s%> foreign <S%H5237><s%> women? <S%H802><s%>"

One of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joiada, <S%H3111><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eliashib <S%H475><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest, <S%H3548><s%> was son-in <S%H2860><s%>-law to Sanballat <S%H5571><s%> the Horonite: <S%H2772><s%> therefore I chased him from me. <S%H1272><s%>
